comment: Smart Data Models - AsynchronousMachine adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/AsynchronousMachine/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A rotating machine whose shaft rotates asynchronously with the electrical field.  Also known as an induction machine with no external connection to the rotor windings, e.g squirrel-cage induction machine.

contents.name: AsynchronousMachineDynamics
contents.comment: Asynchronous machine dynamics model used to describe dynamic behavior of this asynchronous machine. Default: None

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: asynchronousMachineType
contents.comment: Indicates the type of Asynchronous Machine (motor or generator). Default: None

contents.name: converterFedDrive
contents.comment: Indicates whether the machine is a converter fed drive. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: False

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: efficiency
contents.comment: Efficiency of the asynchronous machine at nominal operation in percent. Indicator for converter drive motors. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0.0

contents.name: iaIrRatio
contents.comment: Ratio of locked-rotor current to the rated current of the motor (Ia/Ir). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: nominalFrequency
contents.comment: Nameplate data indicates if the machine is 50 or 60 Hz. Default: 0.0

contents.name: nominalSpeed
contents.comment: Nameplate data.  Depends on the slip and number of pole pairs. Default: 0.0

contents.name: polePairNumber
contents.comment: Number of pole pairs of stator. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0

contents.name: ratedMechanicalPower
contents.comment: Rated mechanical power (Pr in the IEC 60909-0). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909. Default: 0.0

contents.name: reversible
contents.comment: Indicates for converter drive motors if the power can be reversible. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: False

contents.name: rxLockedRotorRatio
contents.comment: Locked rotor ratio (R/X). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
